titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress on the resumption of the Orderly Departure Program from Vietnam conducted by the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 6/17/1987--Introduced. Declares that the Congress calls on the Government of Vietnam to: (1) permit the resumption of the processing under the Orderly Departure Program for Vietnam of applicants approved for resettlement in the United States; (2) permit the departure of certain prisoners, Amerasian children, and other persons of special humanitarian concern to the United States; and (3) work with the U.S. Government to resolve all humanitarian issues which divide the United States and Vietnam.
